data.name: Monster Hunter: World - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
From the sweet melodies of Astera to the dangerously eerie grooves of the Rotten Vale's "Murmurs from the Land Forbidden" battle theme, you can now listen to your favorite Monster Hunter: World music anytime, anywhere!

The 219+ minute soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Includes three high quality formats: MP3 (V0 bitrate), 16-bit FLAC and AAC. (Download size: 478MB for MP3, 1.22GB for FLAC and 667MB for AAC)

Soundtrack files can be found under the game's installation directory below:
\\Steam\steamapps\common\Monster Hunter World

-Tracklist-


Composed and arranged by Tadayoshi Makino, Zhenlan Kang, Akihiko Narita, Yuko Komiyama
Additional performances by the Nashville Music Scoring Orchestra, Ikuko, Daisuke Miyazaki, & Chiaki Yoshiike
Additional lyrics by Kaname Fujioka

Disc 1:

02 - Main Menu - 1:14 - Zhenlan Kang

data.short_description: From the sweet melodies of Astera to the dangerously eerie grooves of the Rotten Vale's "Murmurs from the Land Forbidden" battle theme, you can now listen to your favorite Monster Hunter: World music anytime, anywhere!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic, Portuguese - Brazil, Polish, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460, 3.20GHz or AMD FX™-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x (VRAM 2GB)
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/30fps when graphics settings are set to "Low"
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: : Intel® Core™ i7 3770 3.4GHz or Intel® Core™ i3 8350 4GHz or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1500X
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 (VRAM 3GB) or AMD Radeon™ RX 570 (VRAM 4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c or better)
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/30fps when graphics settings are set to "High"

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
